properties.description: This pipeline is used to migrate source table to data lake(RAW) with full copy support. Pipeline is using value of source name and table name in configuration table.

activities.name: GET_CFG
activities.description: Get migration table information from configuration table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [load_id]
      ,[source_name]
      ,[source]
      ,[interface_id]
      ,[interface_name]
      ,[load_type]
      ,[source_object_schema]
      ,[source_object]
      ,[source_field]
      ,[source_condition]
      ,[target_object_schema]
      ,[target_object]
      ,[target_field]
      ,[target_condition]
      ,[from]
      ,[to]
      ,[interval_type]
      ,[r_mig_flg]
      ,[b_mig_flg]
      ,[c_mig_flg]
      ,[usecase_id]
      ,[src_sys_id]
      ,[trigger_id]
      ,[rest_call_url]
      ,[synapse_object_schema]
      ,[synapse_object]
      ,[synapse_object_type]
      ,NEWID() as ID 
      ,FORMAT(cast(DATEADD(HOUR,9,GETUTCDATE()) as datetime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'
  FROM [META].[LOAD_INV_EAI]
  WHERE 1=1
  AND [r_mig_flg] = 1
  AND [interface_id] = '@{pipeline().parameters.interface_id}'

IF OBJECT_ID ('[@{item().source_object_schema}].[@{item().source_object}]') IS NOT NULL
select COUNT(*) AS src_rec_cnt from [@{item().source_object_schema}].[@{item().source_object}] 
IF OBJECT_ID ('[@{item().source_object_schema}].[@{item().source_object}]') IS NULL
select 0 AS src_rec_cnt

IF OBJECT_ID (N'[@{item().source_object_schema}].[@{item().source_object}]', N'U') IS NOT NULL
select * from [@{item().source_object_schema}].[@{item().source_object}]

IF OBJECT_ID (N'[@{item().source_object_schema}].[@{item().source_object}]', N'U') IS NOT NULL
select * from [@{item().source_object_schema}].[@{item().source_object}]

activities.name: GET_TIME
activities.description: This activity is used to initialize TIME variable with pipeline start time

text.value:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE 1=1 AND name = N'@{activity('GET_CFG').output.firstRow.source_object}' AND type = N'U')
TRUNCATE TABLE [@{activity('GET_CFG').output.firstRow.source_object_schema}].[@{activity('GET_CFG').output.firstRow.source_object}]
